concept.title: Create and configure a new Jenkins project

conbody.p: To keep it simple, I will use Freestyle project.
The sample Katalon Studio project can be cloned from Github.
Next, add and configure the build step Execute Katalon Studio tests provided by Katalon plugin for Jenkins.

ul.li: Katalon Studio will be downloaded and installed automatically based on the version you specify.
Leave out -runMode in the arguments list.
If you want to learn more about xvfb-run configuration please see its manual. If you are not sure, only change the resolution 1024x768x24 and leave other options as-is.

conbody.p: If for some network conditions the Katalon Studio package cannot be downloaded, you can install it manually and specify its location.
conbody.codeblock: me@ubuntu:~$ sudo su root@ubuntu:~$ su jenkins jenkins@ubuntu:~$ wget https://github.com/katalon-studio/katalon-studio/releases/download/v5.10.1/Katalon_Studio_Linux_64-5.10.1.tar.gz jenkins@ubuntu:~$ tar -xzf Katalon_Studio_Linux_64-5.10.1.tar.gz jenkins@ubuntu:~$ cd Katalon_Studio_Linux_64-5.10.1 && pwd
conbody.p: The last command will print the location you need (/var/lib/jenkins/Katalon_Studio_Linux_64-5.10.1).
